LaTeX Math Test

This page demonstrates complex LaTeX math rendering:

Inline math: E=mc2E = mc^2E=mc2

Block math:

∫−∞∞e−x2dx=π\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi}∫−∞∞​e−x2dx=π​

Matrix example:

A=[123456789]A = \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 2 & 3 \\ 4 & 5 & 6 \\ 7 & 8 & 9 \end{bmatrix}A=​147​258​369​​

Nested fractions and sums:

x=−b±b2−4ac2ax = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}x=2a−b±b2−4ac​​ ∑n=1∞1n2=π26\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{n^2} = \frac{\pi^2}{6}n=1∑∞​n21​=6π2​

Multiple integrals:

∬Df(x,y) dx dy\iint_D f(x, y)\,dx\,dy∬D​f(x,y)dxdy

And a more complex nested equation:

F(x)=∫ab(∑n=1∞xnn!)dxF(x) = \int_a^b \left( \sum_{n=1}^\infty \frac{x^n}{n!} \right) dxF(x)=∫ab​(n=1∑∞​n!xn​)dx

You can write any valid LaTeX math here!
